item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 22 Mar 2022
item.description:
1. Friday 03/04 Intern presentations -- open attendance!
  2. Multicore OCaml: February 2022
  3. OCaml 4.14.0, second release candidate
  4. For Diversity and the OCaml Community: Outreachy Summer 2022
  5. Understanding cancellation (in eio)
  6. Atdpy: derive safe JSON interfaces for Python
